Title: The Breadwinner
Writer: Anita Doron (screenplay), Deborah Ellis (screen story), Deborah Ellis (based on the book by)
Actors: Saara Chaudry, Soma Chhaya, Noorin Gulamgaus, Laara Sadiq
Plot: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.
Country: Ireland, Canada, Luxembourg, USA, UK, Philippines, India
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 41 nominations.
